objectives.name: Adorn the Canvas Eclectic
objectives.description:
At the end of each turn, score 1VP for each of the following conditions you satisfy:
                      •You control more objective markers than your opponent.
                      •One or more enemy units were destroyed by ranged attacks made by EMPEROR’S CHILDREN units from your army this turn.
                      •One or more enemy units were destroyed by melee attacks made by EMPEROR’S CHILDREN units from your army this turn.
                      •One or more enemy CHARACTER units were destroyed by attacks made by EMPEROR’S CHILDREN CHARACTER units from your army this turn.
